sentences.english: Road safety checkers, at intersections and other potential dangerous locations.
sentences.chinese: 道路安全员，把守路口和其他具有现在危险的地方。

sentences.english: BrainTrust Query: Do Staff-Wide Training Investments Yield More Sales?
sentences.chinese: 对全员培训的投资会带来更高的销量吗？

sentences.english: An Enterprise can implement the contract management or the labor contract system to all the staff.
sentences.chinese: 企业可以实行合同化管理或者全员劳动合同制。

sentences.english: Seventh, consider revising to reform the personnel system, a system of full employment, through competition.
sentences.chinese: 推进人事制度改革，实行全员聘用制，竞争上岗。

sentences.english: IV. Full quality control, a hill no bad products.
sentences.chinese: 全员品管，创山山产品无不良。

sentences.english: Institute an all-employee training program with periodic updates based upon documented lessons learned.
sentences.chinese: 制定全员培训计划，并根据记录的学习情况定期更新。

sentences.english: The aviation security officer shall undertake the concrete work of security under the leadership of the pilot-in-command.
sentences.chinese: 航空安全员在机长领导下，承担安全保卫的具体工作。

sentences.english: IV. Respect customers by each staff to make communications with Xen-U more healthy and happy;
sentences.chinese: 全员以客为尊，让和人宇往来成为快乐健康的事。

definition: to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
sudden and violent attack/assault/fig. rushed job/concentrated effort to finish a job quickly
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
to go to war/to engage in war
to take up one's post/to be given a job
diaphysis (long segment of a bone)/fig. backbone
to drop from the sky/(fig.) to appear out of nowhere/(attributive) airborne
